name: FeedMyFish
0:
”Alexa, tell fish feeder I feed my fish twice per day”
”Alexa, tell fish feeder I fed the fish”
”Alexa, ask fish feeder if I should feed the fish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fish feeder
des:
Tell Alexa about your feeding schedule, setup a reminder, and easily keep track of when you need to feed your fishy friends. Coming soon, a companion LED button to get a visual reminder when your fish need feeding. This skill does not feed your fish for you, it helps you keep track of when you should feed your fish. Please send suggestions to ideas@reminder.dog

Once you install the skill, setup a feeding plan by saying:

 Alexa, tell fish feeder that I feed my fish twice a day
 Alexa, tell fish feeder I don't feed the fish on Saturdays
 Alexa, tell fish feeder to remove skip days (no skip days is the default and can also be used to stop skipping days you previous told Alexa about)

Now whenever you feed your fish, just say:

 Alexa, tell fish feeder I fed my fish

If you told Alexa you fed the fish too many times, you can remove the last feeding:

 Alexa, tell fish feeder to delete the last feeding

Now you can ask Alexa when you should feed your fish, and get details about past feedings:

 Alexa, ask fish feeder if I should feed the fish
 Alexa, ask fish feeder when was the last time my fish were fed
 Alexa, ask fish feeder if I fed the fish yesterday
 Alexa, ask fish feeder how many times I've fed my fish this month

If you have forgotten how you setup your feeding plan, just ask:

 Alexa, ask fish feeder how often I should feed the fish

To create or remove a daily reminder that you can customize in the Alexa mobile app say:

 Alexa, tell fish feeder to setup a reminder
 Alexa, tell fish feeder to delete the reminder
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
